DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy embed avatar online self-management program teach OAB behavioral therapy OAB-related quality life , symptom , self-efficacy , adherence versus program without avatar
DOC.brief_title: Virtual Avatar Coaches Behavioral Therapy Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: age 55 old woman live community could read speak English urgency ( ≥3 episodes/24 hr . ) ± urge urinary incontinence urinary frequency ( ≥8 times/24 hr . ) nocturia ( awaken ≥2 time night ) hematuria abdominal pain fever cognitive impairment ( MiniCog < 3 ) positive screen depression ( PHQ2 > 3 ) hearing issue uncorrected visual difficulty
